CustomField.description: This field allows you to store an unique identification number for attachments (URL or File types). When you attach a file or URL while creating a service request by using the cart, the attachments are stored using the "Attachment Reference Generator" object mapping and the same reference is stored in this field along with request details. When the cart is saved, these mapped attachments are associated with the respective requests (incidents those were created from service requests) by using the references stored in this field.
CustomField.label: Temporary Attachment Id
